segments.text: I see this cozy kitchen scene unfolding right before my eyes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: There's a woman standing at the sink, carefully drying a plate with a towel.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She looks so focused on that dish, completely oblivious to everything else.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Oh, but look at the sink—water is pouring out over the edge!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's forming a big puddle on the floor, and her foot is right in it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She doesn't even notice; that's kind of funny in a way.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Now, over to the left, there's a boy climbing on a stool to reach the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks wobbly, like it's about to tip any second.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's got one hand in the jar and a plate in the other—sneaky little guy.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And there's a girl next to him, reaching up with her hand out, waiting for her share.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They think they're being so clever, getting cookies behind the woman's back.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The window shows a nice garden outside, all calm and pretty.
segments.speaker: PAR
